subject: Rugby (Game)
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Rowan Varty recently became the first Hong Kong rugby player to wear the jersey of the famed touring side Barbarians, but he's more interested in seeing the sport grow at home.
snippet: Rowan Varty recently became the first Hong Kong rugby player to wear the jersey of the famed touring side Barbarians, but he's more interested in seeing the sport grow at home.
